name: wslog
description: Advanced WebSocket logging system with hierarchical tracing

scripts.install-deps: pnpm install -w && cd server && pnpm install && cd ../client && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install && cd ..
scripts.check-ports: echo 'üîç Checking WSLog ports:' && echo 'Port 3000 (Frontend):' && (lsof -i :3000 || echo 'Clear') && echo 'Port 8085 (Server):' && (lsof -i :8085 || echo 'Clear')
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
